item.title: Link Aggregation w/ LACP
item.description: Link aggregation is not a new concept, yet I still see a lot of folks who don’t make regular use of it. With regard to server networking architecture, especially in heavily virtualized or highly available environments, it’s a crucial tool that provides redundancy, and slightly increased throughput. For how simple it is to implement, it is a no-brainer to consider for physical server networking.
